titles.title: Defending Domestic Orange Juice Production Act
Defending Domestic Orange Juice Production Act
A bill to modify the minimum required weight of orange juice soluble solids.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Defending Domestic Orange Juice Production Act
This bill requires finished pasteurized orange juice to contain at least 10% by weight of orange juice soluble solids (currently 10.5%), exclusive of the solids of any added optional sweetening ingredients.
